Articles.Content: So, is it possible for a moderator to change the owner of a thread? For instance, if a rocket company's CEO decides to leave, would it be possible to "hand" the company to someone else? (with the previous owner's permission of course)
Under certain circumstances it's possible. Send me a PM ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
